full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN GSHIN RJE CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN DAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG GIS GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BRTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GRO DGOS PA CHEN ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, ,RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS @005B SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
